page.title: 17BUNNY SHOP / POST OFFICE
page.content: Mr. Bill Russell owns{Bunny Shop and {Post Office}and has been running it for 9 years. The shop has been open 22 years and is very popular. Mr.Russell has been in the trade all his life and before coming to Bunny he owned a shop in Newport South Wales. Tuesdays and Thursdays are the busiests days and the most unusual thing he has been asked for is a large hat pin. On the shelves are{250}different sweets . Customers come from the surrourding districts. Mr. Russell sells almost anything that his customers need and if he has'nt got what they want they can be sure that the next time they go into the shop it will be there. As {postmaster}Mr. Russell sorts letters and parcels first and second class. In two years time the Post Office will have a{computer}and a{cash dispenser outside.
